name: Adhere
description: INT objects become sticky enough to hold a PC to a ceiling. Lasts until washed.

name: Animal Friendship
description: INT animals obey your orders as well as a trained dog for one day.

name: Animate Object
description: INT objects obey your orders. They move 15' per round.

name: Anthropomorphize
description: INT animals gain human intelligence for one day.

name: Arcane Eye
description: You create a magic eye that flies around under your control for INT turns. You can see through it as well as your normal eyes.

name: Astral Prison
description: An object is frozen in time and space within an invulnerable crystal shell for INT turns.

name: Attract
description: INT + 1 objects are strongly magnetically attracted to each other if they come within 10'.

name: Auditory Illusion
description: You can create illusory sounds that seem to come from INT directions of your choice.

name: Babble
description: INT creatures must loudly and clearly repeat everything you think. They are otherwise mute.

name: Beast Form
description: You and your possessions turn into an animal for up to INT days.

name: Befuddle
description: A creature is unable to form short-term memories for INT turns.

name: Bend Fate
description: Roll INT + 1d20s. After this point, when any creature you can see makes a check, use and discard one of the rolled results until they are all gone.

name: Body Swap
description: You switch bodies with a creature you touch for INT turns. If one body dies, the other dies as well.

name: Catherine
description: A woman wearing a blue dress appears for INT hours. She will obey polite, safe requests.

name: Charm
description: INT humanoids believe they are close friends with you until proven otherwise.

name: Command
description: A creature obeys a single, INT-word command that doesn't harm it.

name: Comprehend
description: You are fluent in all languages for INT hours.

name: Control Plants
description: Plants within INT × 10' obey you. They move 5' per round.

name: Control Weather
description: You control your hex's weather for INT hours.

name: Detect Magic
description: Anything magical within line of sight glows and reveals its properties on request. Lasts 1 day or until you make INT requests.

name: Disassemble
description: INT body parts may be detached at will. You can still control them. Lasts until they are reattached.

name: Disguise
description: You may alter the look of INT humanoids as long as they remain humanoid. Lasts until the subjects speak.

name: Displace
description: An object appears to be up to INT × 10' from its actual position.

name: Duplicate
description: Create INT fragile, porcelain copies of items you can see.

name: Earthquake
description: The ground shakes violently for INT rounds.

name: Elasticity
description: Your body can stretch up to INT × 10'.

name: Elemental Wall
description: Creates a wall of ice or fire INT × 40' long, 5' wide and 10' tall. The wall can curve however you want.

name: Filch
description: INT visible items teleport to your hands.

name: Fog Cloud
description: Fog spreads out in an INT × 10' radius from you. Fades in one turn.

name: Gravity Shift
description: INT creatures can alter their “down” direction at will.

name: Greed
description: INT creatures become obsessed with possessing a visible item.

name: Haste
description: INT creatures have their movement speed tripled.

name: Hatred
description: INT creatures start attacking each other for one turn or until one dies.

name: Hear Whispers
description: A creature can hear all sounds up to 120' away for INT turns.

name: Hover
description: Make INT objects hover 2' above the ground, frictionless. They can support the weight of up to INT people.

name: Hypnotize
description: A creature enters a trance and will answer INT yes or no questions.

name: Icy Touch
description: An ice layer spreads across a surface, up to INT × 10' in radius.

name: Increase Gravity
description: The gravity within INT × 10' of you triples.

name: Invisible Tether
description: INT objects within 10' of each other cannot be moved more than 10' apart from each other.

name: Knock
description: INT locks unlock.

name: Leap
description: You can jump up to INT × 10'.

name: Liquid Air
description: The air within INT × 10' of you becomes swimmable.

name: Lock
description: A door cannot be opened by mundane means for INT turns.

name: Magic Suppressor
description: All magic is nullified while within INT × 10' of you.

name: Manse
description: A furnished house with INT rooms appears for 1 day. It has no food or gear and does not count as a safe haven.

name: Marble Madness
description: Your pockets refill with marbles every round for INT rounds.

name: Masquerade
description: All creatures within INT × 10' of you are compelled to dance.

name: Miniaturize
description: You and INT other touched creatures become mouse-sized.

name: Mirror Image
description: INT illusory copies of you, under your control, appear.

name: Mirrorwalk
description: A mirror becomes a gate to another mirror you touched today.

name: Multiarm
description: You gain INT extra arms.

name: Night Sphere
description: An INT × 40' wide sphere of total darkness appears.

name: Objectify
description: INT willing creatures become inanimate, immobile objects of your choice for as long as they wish. They can still hear and see.

name: Ooze Form
description: Your body and gear become living slime for INT turns.

name: Pacify
description: INT creatures develop an intense hatred of violence unless attacked.

name: Phantom Coach
description: A coach scoops up INT creatures (who are outdoors) and deposits them in a random adjacent hex.

name: Phobia
description: INT creatures become terrified of an object.

name: Pit
description: A pit 10' wide and INT × 10' deep opens in the ground.

name: Primeval Surge
description: An object grows to the size of an elephant for INT turns. If it is a creature, it is enraged.

name: Psychometry
description: The GM answers INT yes or no questions about an object.

name: Pull
description: An object of any size is pulled directly towards you with the force of INT men for one round.

name: Push
description: An object of any size is pushed directly away from you with the force of INT men for one round.

name: Raise Dead
description: INT unarmed skeletons rise from the ground to serve you.

name: Read Mind
description: You can hear the surface thoughts of creatures for INT turns.

name: Repel
description: INT + 1 objects are strongly magnetically repelled from each other if they come within 10'.

name: Scry
description: You can share the vision of a creature you touched today for INT turns.

name: Sculpt Elements
description: Inanimate material acts like clay in your hands for INT turns.

name: Shroud
description: INT creatures are invisible for as long as they can hold their breath (CON × 3 rounds).

name: Shuffle
description: INT creatures switch places randomly.

name: Silence
description: All sound is deadened within 10' of you for INT turns.

name: Sleep
description: INT creatures fall asleep.

name: Smoke Form
description: Your body and gear become living smoke for INT turns.

name: Snail Knight
description: In 10 minutes, a knight atop a giant snail rides into view. He may aid you for INT days if he finds you worthy. The snail cannot move faster than a walk.

name: Sniff
description: A creature can smell all scents up to 120' away for INT turns.

name: Sort
description: Inanimate items sort themselves according to INT categories you set. The categories must be visually verifiable.

name: Speak with Dead
description: The spirit of a touched dead body appears and will answer INT questions (if it can).

name: Spectacle
description: A clearly unreal illusion appears under your control for INT days. It may be up to the size of a palace and has full motion and sound.

name: Spellseize
description: Cast this as a reaction to another spell of level INT or less being cast to make a temporary copy of it that you can cast within 1 day.

name: Spider Climb
description: You can climb surfaces like a spider for INT turns.

name: Summon Cube
description: You may summon or banish a 5' cube of earth 5 times per round for INT rounds. Cubes must be affixed to the earth or to other cubes.

name: Summon Idol
description: A carved stone statue up to INT × 10' tall rises from the ground.

name: Swarm
description: You become a swarm of crows, rats, or piranhas for INT turns. You only take damage from area effects.

name: Telekinesis
description: You may mentally manipulate items (one at a time) up to 10 feet away for INT turns.

name: Telepathy
description: You can project your thoughts into a mind within INT hexes.

name: Teleport
description: An object teleports to a clear patch of ground up to INT × 40' away from its origin point.

name: Thaumaturgic Anchor
description: An object becomes the target of every spell cast within 120' of it for INT turns.

name: Thicket
description: A thicket of trees and dense brush up to INT × 40' wide sprouts up over the course of one round.

name: Time Jump
description: An object disappears as it jumps INT turns into the future. When it returns, it destroys any matter in its space.

name: Time Rush
description: Time within INT × 10' of you goes 10 times faster than the rest of the world. Lasts 10 rounds (for you).

name: Time Slow
description: Time within INT × 10' of you goes 10 times slower than the rest of the world. Lasts 10 rounds (for you).

name: Truth Sense
description: You can detect lies for INT hours.

name: Unravel
description: Cast this as a reaction to another spell of level INT or less going off to nullify it.

name: Upwell
description: A spring of seawater erupts, producing a thousand cubic feet of water per turn for INT turns.

name: Vision
description: You create an illusory object with full motion and sound that only one creature can sense. Lasts INT turns.

name: Visual Illusion
description: You create INT silent, immobile, illusory objects that last until they are touched.

name: Ward
description: A silver circle 40' across appears on the ground around you. Until you leave the circle, INT types of things that you name cannot cross it.

name: Web
description: You can shoot INT × 40' of strong, sticky web. Lasts until burned.

name: Whirlwind
description: You create a vortex of air INT × 10' wide that can deflect missiles.

name: Wizard Mark
description: Your finger produces ultra-colored paint for INT hours. This paint is only visible to you, and can be seen at any distance, even through objects.

name: X-Ray Vision
description: You can see through INT feet of material.
